      Methods in dsl that throw ReceiveException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Play.Character.send(Play.Character<?> receiver, java.lang.String name)
      Makes the character send a message to another character.
      void Play.Character.send(Play.Character<?> receiver, java.lang.String name, int timeout)
      Same as #send(Character, String), but allows specifying a timeout, after which the message will no longer be received (a SendException might be raised if the character is unable to proceed without this message).
      Constructors in dsl with parameters of type ReceiveException 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a character given an identifier, assuming it will catch NoSendException as sender-side exception.
      Character(java.lang.Class<?> characterActorClass, java.lang.String characterName, SendException noSend, ReceiveException noReceive)
      Creates a new character in the play specifying custom instances of the types of SendException and ReceiveException that this character catches.
